					exists = scope:sex_transition

	# BLOWJOB_CUM_IN_MOUTH_DOM: Satisfying your Sweet Tooth
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAc.2.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		event_background = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		event_background = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		event_background = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		event_background = corridor_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_day
		}
		event_background = corridor_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:courtyard
		}
		event_background = courtyard
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:dungeon
		}
		event_background = dungeon
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:docks
		}
		event_background = docks
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:feast
		}
		event_background = feast
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:market
		}
		event_background = market
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:tavern
		}
		event_background = tavern
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:throne_room
		}
		event_background = throne_room
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:garden
		}
		event_background = garden
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:gallows
		}
		event_background = gallows
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		event_background = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		event_background = study
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		event_background = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = disgust
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = schadenfreude
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		first_valid = {
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10
				}
				# Dom Blowjob
				# You prepare to wring him dry with your dexterous tongue.\n
				desc = sex_transition_10
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10006
				}
				# 6: EventsSex.BLOWJOB_DOM -> EventsSex.HANDJOB failed
				# The potent musk of his member, inflated by the proximity of your nose to his pubes, strangely captivates you and you lose this opportunity to assert more dominance.\n
				desc = sex_transition_10006
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10007
				}
				# 7: EventsSex.BLOWJOB_DOM -> EventsSex.BLOWJOB_DOM failed
				# The incessant invasion of his member down your throat momentarily puts you in a trance, leaving the initiative in his hands.\n
				desc = sex_transition_10007
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10009
				}
				# 9: EventsSex.BLOWJOB_DOM -> EventsCum.BLOWJOB_RUINED_ORGASM failed
				# As you try to pull back, he holds the back of your head with his hands.\n
				desc = sex_transition_10009
			}
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition > 10000
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 4
			}
			# defaulted to 10: EventsSex.BLOWJOB_DOM -> EventsCum.BLOWJOB_CUM_IN_MOUTH_DOM
			desc = sex_transition_10
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				scope:root_cum = yes
			}
			desc = root_cum_f
		}
		desc = LIDAc.2.desc
	}
	immediate = {
		check_if_root_cum_effect = yes
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = -1
		}
		carn_had_sex_with_effect = {
			CHARACTER_1 = root
			CHARACTER_2 = scope:affairs_partner
			C1_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 0
			C2_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 0
			STRESS_EFFECTS = yes
			DRAMA = yes
		}
		random = {
			chance = 10
			become_more_sub_effect = yes
		}
		scope:affairs_partner = {
			random = {
				chance = 10
				become_more_dom_effect = yes
			}
		}
		debug_log_scopes = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = LIDAoption.48
	}
}
LIDAc.6 = {
	# BLOWJOB_CUM_IN_MOUTH_SUB: Down the Gullet
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAc.6.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		event_background = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		event_background = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		event_background = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		event_background = corridor_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_day
		}
		event_background = corridor_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:courtyard
		}
		event_background = courtyard
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:dungeon
		}
		event_background = dungeon
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:docks
		}
		event_background = docks
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:feast
		}
		event_background = feast
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:market
		}
		event_background = market
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:tavern
		}
		event_background = tavern
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:throne_room
		}
		event_background = throne_room
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:garden
		}
		event_background = garden
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:gallows
		}
		event_background = gallows
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		event_background = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		event_background = study
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		event_background = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = shame
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = schadenfreude
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		first_valid = {
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 16
				}
				# Sub Blowjob
				# You don't resist when he plunges into your mouth to deposit his seed.\n
				desc = sex_transition_16
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 20
				}
				# Deepthroat
				# You don't have any say in it, or in anything else at the moment, as his mass fills your throat.\n
				desc = sex_transition_20
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10012
				}
				# 12: EventsSex.BLOWJOB_SUB -> EventsSex.BLOWJOB_DOM failed
				# Putting both hands on his waist, you attempt to curb his thrusts. However, on your knees beneath him, you don't have enough leverage to forcefully stop him and he seems to have no intention of letting you back in control.\n
				desc = sex_transition_10012
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10015
				}
				# 15: EventsSex.BLOWJOB_SUB -> EventsCum.HANDJOB_CUM_IN_HAND failed
				# Try as you might, [affairs_partner.GetFirstName] stops you from pulling away.\n
				desc = sex_transition_10015
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10018
				}
				# 18: EventsSex.DEEPTHROAT -> EventsSex.BLOWJOB_SUB failed
				# Putting both hands on his waist, you push and try to stop his thrusts. It's all in vain, however, as he ignores you.\n
				desc = sex_transition_10018
			}
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition > 10000
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 6
			}
			# defaulted to 16: EventsSex.BLOWJOB_SUB -> EventsCum.BLOWJOB_CUM_IN_MOUTH_SUB
			desc = sex_transition_16
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition > 10000
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 7
			}
			# defaulted to 20: EventsSex.DEEPTHROAT -> EventsCum.BLOWJOB_CUM_IN_MOUTH_SUB
			desc = sex_transition_20
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				scope:root_cum = yes
			}
			desc = root_cum_f
		}
		desc = LIDAc.6.desc
	}
	immediate = {
		check_if_root_cum_effect = yes
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = -2
		}
		carn_had_sex_with_effect = {
			CHARACTER_1 = root
			CHARACTER_2 = scope:affairs_partner
			C1_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 0
			C2_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 0
			STRESS_EFFECTS = yes
			DRAMA = yes
		}
		random = {
			chance = 20
			become_more_sub_effect = yes
		}
		scope:affairs_partner = {
			random = {
				chance = 20
				become_more_dom_effect = yes
			}
		}
		debug_log_scopes = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = LIDAoption.49
	}
}
LIDAc.4 = {
	# BLOWJOB_RUINED_ORGASM: A Firm Grasp on His Release
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAc.4.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		event_background = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		event_background = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		event_background = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		event_background = corridor_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_day
		}
		event_background = corridor_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:courtyard
		}
		event_background = courtyard
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:dungeon
		}
		event_background = dungeon
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:docks
		}
		event_background = docks
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:feast
		}
		event_background = feast
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:market
		}
		event_background = market
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:tavern
		}
		event_background = tavern
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:throne_room
		}
		event_background = throne_room
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:garden
		}
		event_background = garden
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:gallows
		}
		event_background = gallows
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		event_background = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		event_background = study
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		event_background = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = dismissal
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = beg
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		first_valid = {
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 9
				}
				# Dom Blowjob
				# You pull back and slap his rod, disrupting the build up to his climax.\n
				desc = sex_transition_9
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10006
				}
				# 6: EventsSex.BLOWJOB_DOM -> EventsSex.HANDJOB failed
				# The potent musk of his member, inflated by the proximity of your nose to his pubes, strangely captivates you and you lose this opportunity to assert more dominance.\n
				desc = sex_transition_10006
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10007
				}
				# 7: EventsSex.BLOWJOB_DOM -> EventsSex.BLOWJOB_DOM failed
				# The incessant invasion of his member down your throat momentarily puts you in a trance, leaving the initiative in his hands.\n
				desc = sex_transition_10007
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10009
				}
				# 9: EventsSex.BLOWJOB_DOM -> EventsCum.BLOWJOB_RUINED_ORGASM failed
				# As you try to pull back, he holds the back of your head with his hands.\n
				desc = sex_transition_10009
			}
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition > 10000
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 4
			}
			# defaulted to 9: EventsSex.BLOWJOB_DOM -> EventsCum.BLOWJOB_RUINED_ORGASM
			desc = sex_transition_9
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				scope:root_cum = yes
			}
			desc = root_cum_f
		}
		desc = LIDAc.4.desc
	}
	immediate = {
		check_if_root_cum_effect = yes
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = 2
		}
		carn_had_sex_with_effect = {
			CHARACTER_1 = root
			CHARACTER_2 = scope:affairs_partner
			C1_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 0
			C2_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 0
			STRESS_EFFECTS = yes
			DRAMA = yes
		}
		random = {
			chance = 35
			become_more_dom_effect = yes
		}
		scope:affairs_partner = {
			random = {
				chance = 35
				become_more_sub_effect = yes
			}
		}
		debug_log_scopes = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = LIDAoption.50
	}
}
LIDAc.7 = {
	# PULL_OUT_CUM_ON_ASS: More Icing on the Cake
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAc.7.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		event_background = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		event_background = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		event_background = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		event_background = corridor_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_day
		}
		event_background = corridor_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:courtyard
		}
		event_background = courtyard
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:dungeon
		}
		event_background = dungeon
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:docks
		}
		event_background = docks
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:feast
		}
		event_background = feast
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:market
		}
		event_background = market
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:tavern
		}
		event_background = tavern
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:throne_room
		}
		event_background = throne_room
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:garden
		}
		event_background = garden
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:gallows
		}
		event_background = gallows
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		event_background = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		event_background = study
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		event_background = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = flirtation
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = flirtation_left
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		first_valid = {
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 43
				}
				# Standing Fucked from Behind
				# Your requests sways [affairs_partner.GetFirstName].\n
				desc = sex_transition_43
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10040
				}
				# 40: EventsSex.STANDING_FUCKED_FROM_BEHIND -> EventsSex.BLOWJOB_DOM failed
				# You attempt to pull away and recover some control, but you find it hard to focus and pull away from this pleasure.\n
				desc = sex_transition_10040
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10041
				}
				# 41: EventsSex.STANDING_FUCKED_FROM_BEHIND -> EventsSex.BLOWJOB_SUB failed
				# You attempt to extricate yourself with gravity's assistance. However, he grabs your arms and hoists you up, giving you a few sharp thrusts while spanking you as punishment for trying to escape.\n
				desc = sex_transition_10041
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10043
				}
				# 43: EventsSex.STANDING_FUCKED_FROM_BEHIND -> EventsCum.PULL_OUT_CUM_ON_ASS failed
				# In the heat of the moment, your request falls on deaf ears.\n
				desc = sex_transition_10043
			}
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition > 10000
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 5
			}
			# defaulted to 43: EventsSex.STANDING_FUCKED_FROM_BEHIND -> EventsCum.PULL_OUT_CUM_ON_ASS
			desc = sex_transition_43
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				scope:root_cum = yes
			}
			desc = root_cum_f
		}
		desc = LIDAc.7.desc
	}
	immediate = {
		check_if_root_cum_effect = yes
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = -1
		}
		carn_had_sex_with_effect = {
			CHARACTER_1 = root
			CHARACTER_2 = scope:affairs_partner
			C1_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 0
			C2_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 0
			STRESS_EFFECTS = yes
			DRAMA = yes
		}
		random = {
			chance = 10
			become_more_sub_effect = yes
		}
		scope:affairs_partner = {
			random = {
				chance = 10
				become_more_dom_effect = yes
			}
		}
		debug_log_scopes = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = LIDAoption.51
	}
}
LIDAc.8 = {
	# FUCK_BEHIND_CREAMPIE: Plowing the Fields
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAc.8.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		event_background = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		event_background = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		event_background = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		event_background = corridor_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_day
		}
		event_background = corridor_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:courtyard
		}
		event_background = courtyard
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:dungeon
		}
		event_background = dungeon
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:docks
		}
		event_background = docks
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:feast
		}
		event_background = feast
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:market
		}
		event_background = market
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:tavern
		}
		event_background = tavern
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:throne_room
		}
		event_background = throne_room
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:garden
		}
		event_background = garden
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:gallows
		}
		event_background = gallows
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		event_background = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		event_background = study
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		event_background = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = worry
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = personality_bold
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		first_valid = {
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 44
				}
				# Standing Fucked from Behind
				# Happy to fulfill your request, he prepares to unleash his load.\n
				desc = sex_transition_44
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10040
				}
				# 40: EventsSex.STANDING_FUCKED_FROM_BEHIND -> EventsSex.BLOWJOB_DOM failed
				# You attempt to pull away and recover some control, but you find it hard to focus and pull away from this pleasure.\n
				desc = sex_transition_10040
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10041
				}
				# 41: EventsSex.STANDING_FUCKED_FROM_BEHIND -> EventsSex.BLOWJOB_SUB failed
				# You attempt to extricate yourself with gravity's assistance. However, he grabs your arms and hoists you up, giving you a few sharp thrusts while spanking you as punishment for trying to escape.\n
				desc = sex_transition_10041
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10043
				}
				# 43: EventsSex.STANDING_FUCKED_FROM_BEHIND -> EventsCum.PULL_OUT_CUM_ON_ASS failed
				# In the heat of the moment, your request falls on deaf ears.\n
				desc = sex_transition_10043
			}
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition > 10000
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 5
			}
			# defaulted to 44: EventsSex.STANDING_FUCKED_FROM_BEHIND -> EventsCum.FUCK_BEHIND_CREAMPIE
			desc = sex_transition_44
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				scope:root_cum = yes
			}
			desc = root_cum_f
		}
		desc = LIDAc.8.desc
	}
	immediate = {
		check_if_root_cum_effect = yes
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = -3
		}
		carn_had_sex_with_effect = {
			CHARACTER_1 = root
			CHARACTER_2 = scope:affairs_partner
			C1_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = pregnancy_chance
			C2_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 0
			STRESS_EFFECTS = yes
			DRAMA = yes
		}
		random = {
			chance = 20
			become_more_sub_effect = yes
		}
		scope:affairs_partner = {
			random = {
				chance = 20
				become_more_dom_effect = yes
			}
		}
		debug_log_scopes = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = LIDAoption.52
	}
}
